pageContext.Title: Design/UX - Fundamentals
pageContext.Description:
ðŸ‘‰ This guide is part of the Design/UX Guides. Please follow the order:

  • Fundamentals
  • Interaction
  • Testing

User Experience (UX) is comprised of a set of concepts that help you create not only an interface that works well, but also to  think of your product through the eyes of the user. Is the information easy to find? Are there too many clicks between wish and accomplishment? Can people read the text in this color? Questions like this and many more are the subject of UX. In this Guide you will learn the basic concepts around it.
